footerText: © 2025 Anastasia’s Light Incorporated — Shining a light on mental health.
aboutTitle: Honoring a daughter. Lifting our community.
aboutP1: Founded in loving memory of Anastasia, Anastasia’s Light is a registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit committed to shining hope on mental health. We collaborate with trusted organizations that provide therapy, crisis support, and equine-assisted services.
aboutP2: Every donation and event ticket helps expand access to compassionate care. Together, we can bring light to those navigating darkness and build resilient, healthy communities.
heroSubtitle: Anastasia’s Light is a 501(c)(3) created to honor the memory of Anastasia Gumbel, and support nonprofits providing life-changing mental health services for our community.
heroTitle: Shining a light on mental health
